description: Describes the specified schema in detail.

nested_items.name: RegistryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the registry.

nested_items.name: SchemaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of schema if specified when created.

nested_items.name: DataFormat
nested_items.description: The data format of the schema definition. Currently AVRO, JSON and PROTOBUF are supported.

nested_items.name: Compatibility
nested_items.description: The compatibility mode of the schema.

nested_items.name: SchemaCheckpoint
nested_items.description: The version number of the checkpoint (the last time the compatibility mode was changed).

nested_items.name: LatestSchemaVersion
nested_items.description: The latest version of the schema associated with the returned schema definition.

nested_items.name: NextSchemaVersion
nested_items.description: The next version of the schema associated with the returned schema definition.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the schema was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the schema was updated.
